homeSubTitleDisconnected: Connect your wallet to get started
homeSubTitleConnected: Find a Fractal above or create a new one
helperSigners: The number of trusted users for this Multisig
helperSigThreshold: The number of signatures needed to approve a proposal
subTitleTrustedAddresses: The following users are able to submit and approve proposals
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) voting is allowed after proposal creation
helperQuorum: The percentage of total possible token votes required to pass a proposal
governanceDescription: These configuration values can be changed later via DAO proposal
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) a successful proposal must be executed within
helperTimelockPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) a passed proposal must wait to be executed on the blockchain
helperVetoVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent to veto a proposal on this DAO
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent to freeze this DAO entirely
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) for a Freeze Votes's starting and ending point
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in seconds) a successful Freeze Vote will freeze this DAO
vetoGuardDescription: These configuration values may be changed later on by passing a proposal to do so on this child DAO
helperParentAllocation: Amount of tokens to allocate to parentDAO
helperTokenName: What is your governance token called?
helperTokenSymbol: The symbol for your token (3-5 chars)
descMultisigGov: Multisignature DAO governance on a Safe contract wallet
descUsulGov: ERC-20 token voting governance on a Safe contract wallet, powered by Usul mod
helperAllocations: Unallocated tokens will be placed in your DAO's treasury
